content.body: Does anyone know why eg `button` and `form` cannot have shadow roots, or was [the allowlist](https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#valid-shadow-host-name) deliberately conservative?
content.formatted_body: Does anyone know why eg button and form cannot have shadow roots, or was the allowlist deliberately conservative?

content.body: Jake Archibald: it is conservative, yeah. I'm not sure how much interest there is to extend shadow roots for non-custom elements though. I think in retrospect we should only have had shadow roots for custom elements. Would have allowed for a better design overall, but it's always easier with hindsight.
